resources.string:
Next bugfix release:
 · Fix: Avoid app freeze when mapping large lists on OSM maps
 
 
 2019.11.28:
 · Fix: Update distance info on Google Maps while moving
 
 
 2019.11.11:
 · New: Updated Google Maps API to v2 and enable Google Maps again for Android 10
 · New: Set targetSDK to 28 to comply with upcoming Play Store requirements
 · New: Show warning on main screen if not logged in
 · New: Extend compact icon mode to Google Maps
 · Fixed: Several issues with the history trail
 · Fixed: Parsing empty waypoint notes used for navigation
